name: Fusion Dawn
description:
Im a new godot developer and I'm now working on this Pixel Style RPG. Hope you like it! I'm still working on it so it is not ready. But if you see bugs, please report that!

Things you could do in the game(if the game is ready):

-Enter caves

-Fight enemies

-Explore the world

-Fight boses Hope you will like it!

Hope you like it!

For source code (Godot files) go to this link:

https://github.com/dimkauzh/Fusion-Dawn
